name: Block Party (itch) (Jokairo)
description:
In Block Party, the goal is to stand on a tile that matches the announced color. A new color is announced at the start of each round. If you don't get to the right color before a timer runs out, you will fall off the map and be eliminated. Every other round the time decreases and the game gets more difficult. The last player remaining is the winner.

Choose either Easy Mode, Hard Mode or Survivor Mode. In Easy and Hard mode you will dance against 7 other AI players, and their skill level is based on the difficulty you have chosen. Survivor Mode is the regular game but without the AI players.

Controls:

  • WASD / Arrow Keys - Move
  • Spacebar - Select / Jump
